Package it.polimi.polishare.peer.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddReviewController
    Manages the popup used to add a review on a specific note.
    CatalogController
    Manages the catalog interface that shows notes downloaded by the current user.
    ChatController
    Manages the chat's popup.
    DownloadController
    Manages the interface showing the current active downloads.
    LoginController
    Manages the login interface.
    MainController
    Manages the main unauthenticated view.
    PublishController
    Manages the interface used to publish a note.
    RegisterController
    Manages the interface used to register a new user on the platform.
    ReviewsController
    Displays the reviews associated to a given note.
    SearchController
    Manages the interface used by authenticated users to query the DHT.
    SideMenuController
    Manages the side menu's interface.
    UnauthenticatedSearchController
    Manages the interface used by unauthenticated users to query the DHT.
    UnauthenticatedSideMenuController
    Manages the unauthenticated side menu's interface.
    WelcomeController
    Manages the welcome screen.
